description: Mobile techniques used by KeyRaider, ATT&CK software S0288 v1.1
name: KeyRaider (S0288)

techniques.comment: [KeyRaider](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0288) has built-in functionality to lock victims out of devices and hold them for ransom.(Citation: Xiao-KeyRaider)

Most [KeyRaider](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0288) samples hook SSLRead and SSLWrite functions in the itunesstored process to intercept device communication with the Apple App Store.(Citation: Xiao-KeyRaider)
Most [KeyRaider](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0288) samples search to find the Apple account's username, password and device's GUID in data being transferred.(Citation: Xiao-KeyRaider)
